item.description:
----- Original Message -----
From: New Meetup
To: lethemetcake@metrocast.net
Sent: Saturday, March 13, 2010 2:19 AM
Subject: Announcing "The NH Center for Constitutional Studies offering a 1 Day Constitutional Seminar", Saturday, March 27, 2010 8:15 AM!


Meetup Announcement
The New Hampshire Capital Area 912 Project
Your group has a Meetup Saturday, March 27, 2010 8:15 AM!
What
The NH Center for Constitutional Studies offering a 1 Day Constitutional Seminar

When

Saturday, March 27, 2010 8:15 AM

Who
1 Yes / 0 Maybe

Where
Great Bay Community College
320 Corporate Drive
Portsmouth NH 03801


RSVP Now
YES

MAYBE

NO


Here's what people are saying about this Meetup Group

"everyone is considerate of others and their opinions. when you speak everyone listens and responds at one time or another."
— Matthew Cook

"Power in numbers."
— Kevin Sleeper

Learn more about this Meetup


Meetup Description
Is nationalized healthcare in the Constitution?...

Come find out?

The NH Center for Constitutional Studies will be will be hosting the course: Totally Ignored & Misconstrued Clauses of the Constitution at Great Bay Community College, Portsmouth on March 27.

Registration fee: $30.00 includes box lunch - choose from three sandwich offerings TBD

Continental breakfast will be served at check-in: 8:30 AM

Seminar will start promptly at 9:15 AM
Runs until 3:30

Please register using the link below

Registration now open on Line: www.nhccs.org (http://www.nhccs.org/...)
Will be an interactive seminar - class is limited to 30 people to allow enough time for questions

Tentative syllabus:
* Introduction - Key concepts regarding the American Founding -Enumerated Powers Commerce clause.
* General Welfare Clause
* Necessary and Proper Clause
* Supremacy Clause

More details forthcoming on the web site.

Email: _c...@nhccs.org_ (mailto:c...@nhccs.org)
Participants can register online - Registration opens March 1.

This is not a 9 12 sponsored event, please RSVP thru web address provided. Class size is limited please RSVP quickly.

Add info@meetup.com to your address book to receive all Meetup emails

To manage your email settings for this group, click here

Meetup, PO Box 4668 #37895 New York, New York 10163-4668
item.name: constitutional seminar
